data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Ya‘an, Sichuan, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ya‘an, Sichuan, China

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Ya'an. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Ya'an hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Ya‘an, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Nosu, Shengzha people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Nosu, Shengzha people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Nosu, Shengzha people is yours.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Ya‘an, Sichuan, China not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ya‘an, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Ya'an who will make disciples who make disciples.

location.name: Ya'an
location.people_groups_list: Ersu, Nosu, Yinuo, Minyag, Western, Luzu, Minyag, Eastern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ersu (45,000), Nosu, Yinuo (674,000), Minyag, Western (12,000), Luzu (1,200), Minyag, Eastern (2,000)
